price: Jesu li to oni jedni drugima oporučili? Nisu, nego su oni ljudi koji su u zlu svaku mjeru bili prevršili.
arabic: أَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِهِۦۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: atawāṣaw bihi bal hum qawmun ṭāghūna
translations: Have they transmitted it to them
Have they transmitted it to them
